trans-unit.source: The SignerInfoCollection class represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> objects.
SignerInfoCollection implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated.

It is a read-only class accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.SignerInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CounterSignerInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The CopyTo method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection to an array.
An <xref:System.Array> object to which the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
The zero-based index in `array` where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection is copied.
One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
The CopyTo method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection to a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> array.
An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> objects where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
The zero-based index in `array` where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection is copied.
One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
The Count property retrieves the number of items in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
An int value that represents the number of items in the collection.

The GetEnumerator method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
The IsSynchronized property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which means the collection is not thread safe.
A <xref:System.Boolean> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which means the collection is not thread safe.
The Item property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
An int value that represents the index in the collection.
The index is zero based.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object at the specified index.
The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
The SyncRoot property retrieves an <xref:System.Object> object is used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
An <xref:System.Object> object is used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

The IEnumerable.GetEnumerator method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
